articles.title: Berlin conference lays out vision of post-war Ukraine - Reuters UK
articles.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy and the European hosts of a conference on his country's reconstruction laid out a vision of a future Ukraine as a European Union member and major exporter of green energy to the continent on Tuesay.

articles.title: European, US officials track BQ.1 Omicron subvariant rises - CIDRAP
